name: places/ChIJD1u-EaMZ2jERaLhNfFkR45I/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTUNZb1luWC1BRRAB
text: {'text': 'Visited the National Museum of Singapore and really enjoyed the experience.\nThe exhibits were engaging, and I loved how history was brought to life through multimedia and design.\nStill feel like there’s more to explore—definitely planning to go back again soon.', 'languageCode': 'en'}
originalText: {'text': 'Visited the National Museum of Singapore and really enjoyed the experience.\nThe exhibits were engaging, and I loved how history was brought to life through multimedia and design.\nStill feel like there’s more to explore—definitely planning to go back again soon.', 'languageCode': 'en'}

name: places/ChIJD1u-EaMZ2jERaLhNfFkR45I/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VKQ0huZV92XzlPOWRnEAE
text: {'text': 'I was impressed by the visit to this museum, it had a very thorough explanation of the history of Singapore and there were a lot of interesting things on display here.\n\nHalfway through the museum I bumped into the English speaking tour group and I found that the guide here was very interesting and engaging. I stuck around with that group throughout the rest of the tour and I found he had a lot of interesting points to make.', 'languageCode': 'en'}

I stuck around with that group throughout the rest of the tour and I found he had a lot of interesting points to make.', 'languageCode': 'en'}

name: places/ChIJD1u-EaMZ2jERaLhNfFkR45I/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTURJLS15dk5nEAE
places/ChIJD1u-EaMZ2jERaLhNfFkR45I/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTURvNUthV193RRAB
text: {'text': 'A truly impressive museum that beautifully captures the essence and history of Singapore.\nFrom its early beginnings to its rise as a modern global city, the exhibits are thoughtfully curated and rich with stories that bring the nation’s journey to life. A must-visit for anyone looking to understand Singapore’s cultural heritage and remarkable transformation.', 'languageCode': 'en'}
originalText: {'text': 'A truly impressive museum that beautifully captures the essence and history of Singapore.\nFrom its early beginnings to its rise as a modern global city, the exhibits are thoughtfully curated and rich with stories that bring the nation’s journey to life. A must-visit for anyone looking to understand Singapore’s cultural heritage and remarkable transformation.', 'languageCode': 'en'}

name: places/ChIJD1u-EaMZ2jERaLhNfFkR45I/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTURvMU5IdEx3EAE
text: {'text': 'This is a must for any visitors interested in the history of Singapore. Apart from a very short intro to the prehistory and pre-British history, the rest is well documented. Exhibits and sections mostly devoted to the British colonial era, the WW2 Japanese occupation, pre-independence years with Malasia then full independence. Allow several hours!', 'languageCode': 'en'}
originalText: {'text': 'This is a must for any visitors interested in the history of Singapore. Apart from a very short intro to the prehistory and pre-British history, the rest is well documented. Allow several hours!', 'languageCode': 'en'}
